name: 4ST3 GDevelop Tutorial
description:
Controls:

  • Left and Right to move
  • Up to climb ladders
  • Space bar or Shift Key to jump
  • x to start and scroll through conversation

Game was made during a game development course. The students and instructor made the game collectively during class time. Meant as a tutorial for GDevelop for students to use for their final projects.

Assets: GDevelop asset store.

Music: Maplestory.

=====

Few changes since the class:

  • Intro scene and best score
  • Cosmetic changes
